name: PivotLayout
description: Represents the visual layout of the PivotTable.

properties.name: showColumnGrandTotals
properties.description: True if the PivotTable report shows grand totals for columns.

properties.name: showRowGrandTotals
properties.description: True if the PivotTable report shows grand totals for rows.

properties.name: enableFieldList
properties.description: True if the field list should be shown or hidden from the UI.

properties.name: layoutType
properties.description: This property indicates the PivotLayoutType of all fields on the PivotTable. If fields have different states, this will be null.

properties.name: subtotalLocation
properties.description: This property indicates the SubtotalLocationType of all fields on the PivotTable. If fields have different states, this will be null.

methods.name: getRange
methods.description: Returns the range the PivotTable exists on, excluding the filter area.

methods.name: getRowLabelRange
methods.description: Returns the range where the PivotTable's row labels reside.

methods.name: getColumnLabelRange
methods.description: Returns the range where the PivotTable's column labels reside.

methods.name: getFilterAxisRange
methods.description: Returns the range of the PivotTable's filter area.

methods.name: getDataBodyRange
methods.description: Returns the range where the PivotTable's data values reside.
